What is the output of the following Kotlin code snippet? 

fun main() { 
 val list = listOf(Pair("a", 1), Pair("b", 2), Pair("c", 3)) 
 val (letters, numbers) = list.unzip() 
 println("Letters: $letters") 
 println("Numbers: $numbers") 
}
Letters: [a, b, c] Numbers: [1, 2, 3]
Letters: [1, 2, 3] Numbers: [a, b, c]
Letters: [a, b, c] Numbers: [a, b, c]
Letters: [1, 2, 3] Numbers: [1, 2, 3]
Letters: [a, b, c] Numbers: [1, 2, 3]
